provider.selectSQL: SELECT CASE WHEN s.recordId >= 2147483646 THEN NULL ELSE s.recordId END recordId1, convert(CHAR(12), s.refuellingDate, 104) refuellingDate1, s.waybillNumber, CAST(s.garageNumber AS CHAR(4))+' '+t.model+' '+t.registrationNumber model, isNull(d.zex,'')+' '+ isNull(d.tab,'')+' '+CASE WHEN s.recordId = 2147483647 THEN 'ИТОГО ПО ВЕДОМОСТИ :' WHEN s.recordId = 2147483646 THEN '= ИТОГО ПО СТРАНИЦЕ =' ELSE isNull(d.fio,'') END fio, s.quantity, CASE WHEN s.recordId >= 2147483646 THEN NULL ELSE '________________' END + CASE WHEN correctionId IS NULL THEN '__________' ELSE '/корр.'+CAST(correctionId AS CHAR(8))+'/' END sign FROM getWaybillsRefuellingSheet(0{_sheet},10, {_page}) s LEFT JOIN transportFacilities t ON t.garageNumber =s.garageNumber and t.ownerId = dbo.getCurrentOwner() LEFT JOIN drivers d ON d.driverId = s.driverId WHERE refuellingId = 0 OR refuellingId IS NULL ORDER BY s.recordId
